title: gamma: An R Package for Dose Rate Estimation from in-Situ Gamma-Ray Spectrometry
description: Process in-situ gamma-ray spectrometry for luminescence dating. This package allows to import, inspect and correct the energy shifts of Gamma-ray spectra. It provides methods for estimating the gamma dose rate by the use of a calibration curve. The package only supports Canberra CNF and TKA files.
notes: This work received a state financial support managed by the Agence Nationale de la Recherche (France) through the program Investissements d'avenir (ref. 10-LABX-0052 and 11-IDEX-0001).
